title: A look at the technical and psychological evolution of driving
content:
I bet many analysts have discussed this topic repeatedly, but a couple of research papers later, I realized how much of it remains uncovered by the average Joe. I began my research with the technical understanding of regulations, practices, and limitations; and ended the study with the psychological and behavioral effects of driving on a human being. I have enjoyed the latter more, and that is why I took down my technical articles realizing the archaic concepts, but instead want to approach this from the young novel view, having driven in all the styles Iâ€™m about to mention and how…

This story continues at The Next Web
description: The psychology of driving is underestimated. I take a look at the different technical and psychological states as autonomous vehicles evolve.
